meanings.definition: A flag or banner with three different colors.
meanings.sent1: The tricolours of the flag were red, blue, and green.
meanings.sent2: During the parade, the tricolours waved proudly in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The tricolours of the flag decided to have a race to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The tricolours of unity symbolized the coming together of different communities.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant tricolours stood out against the gray sky, catching everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: A sports team or organization with three official colors.
meanings.sent1: The tricolours of the team were red, yellow, and black.
meanings.sent2: Fans proudly wore the tricolours of their favorite sports team.
meanings.sent3: The tricolours of the team decided to have a dance-off to celebrate their victory.
meanings.sent4: The tricolours of the organization represented strength, passion, and unity.
meanings.sent5: The bold tricolours on the team's jerseys made them easily recognizable on the field.
